story.name: Who We Are
story.content: {"_uid":"dbfed930-69e3-4532-9446-13264e8737b1","body":[{"_uid":"f1451d83-675c-48ae-a3da-9d328a9e9c07","title":"WE’RE HERE FOR YOU.","component":"hero","hero_image":{"id":4709426,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/1350x1275/881fb9d159/who-we-are-2-900x850.jpg","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"button_text":"","description":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"At ANDYSMANCLUB, we want to eliminate the stigma surrounding mental health and create a judgment-free, confidential space where men can be open about the storms in their lives. We aim to achieve this through weekly, free-to-attend peer-to-peer support groups for men aged over 18. Watch the video below to find out why.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"button_target":{"id":"","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":""},"background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"8f61fecc-6d57-47f4-b35a-670fe1f45c8f","label":"","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"#ThatOneMan","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"italic"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"#ThatOneMan is our promise to you, our volunteers, our attendees and our supporters, that no matter how quickly we grow, how many awards we win, how many partnerships we strike up or how many clubs we open, we will always remain true to our original goal. To be able to provide support to #ThatOneMan in his time of need, and help him see that his tomorrow can be better than his today.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"two-column-text","button_text":"","button_target":{"id":"","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":""},"background_color":"bg-black","white_background":false},{"_uid":"c2b988f2-22a3-4ce3-9bf7-35b5c8d33c0f","title":"ANDY’S STORY - LAD BIBLE","component":"youtube_video","youtube_id":"EcyedyEXJCg?si=d6FxiCWHTVO-MyrV","background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"a73fe6f3-333c-4c7d-805e-45edcabfe53a","image":{"id":4707192,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/555x826/5bc137595a/our-story-370x550.jpg","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"label":"OUR STORY","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"WE’RE A BUNCH OF BLOKES HAVING A CHAT OVER A BREW","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"& BISCUIT.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"In mid-2016, nine men met in a small room in the stereotypical Yorkshire town of Halifax with a simple aim of talking through their issues and helping each other deal with their mental health. All in attendance were agreed there was a magic in that room that had to be shared. This was the start of a movement that has grown faster than anyone first involved could have ever imagined. Fast forward 7 years and ANDYSMANCLUB now has groups at over 150 locations across three countries of the UK. ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB takes its name from Andrew Roberts, a man who sadly took his own life aged 23 in early 2016. Andy’s family had no inkling that he was suffering or struggling to the extent that he would do this, and as a result looked deeper into male suicide and men’s mental health. They soon discovered that male suicide is the biggest killer of men under 50, with male mental health surrounded by well-ingrained cultural stigma in the UK. ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"Elaine Roberts and Luke Ambler are Andy’s Mum and Brother-in-Law, together they came up with the idea of ANDYSMANCLUB, a group where men aged 18 and above can speak openly about their mental health in a judgment-free, non-clinical environment. Groups now operate nationwide and are completely volunteer-led, with the vast majority of group facilitators having first interacted with ANDYSMANCLUB when they came through the door as a service user.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"With a service used on a weekly basis by over 3000 men, and an army of 900+ facilitators, the movement is always continuing to grow on a week-by-week basis.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"two-column-text-image","button_text":"","button_target":{"id":"","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":""},"background_color":"bg-white","black_background":false},{"_uid":"75f52f73-5627-4bf0-94ac-02b4046374a5","items":["4bb2a7ea-f9e2-4439-80b7-1b729ba3589f","64f30a81-642a-4e4d-b757-ddd6462f4cd3","6bd1e6d7-76f2-4393-864c-fafb45539175","d4913e0d-737d-43fd-8c15-dc2a2a9b5ed1","a22ce652-893b-43bb-a2a2-441deef31236","b8a5c024-4713-42b9-ba62-d5a5ab1b02c4","3b376000-b121-4627-bdc0-9f0f97daf1fc","409a1ea4-bc49-43f0-a7a9-c9864f76b8cd"],"label":"REAL PEOPLE, REAL STORIES","component":"testimonials","button_text":"See another story","background_color":"bg-white","black_background":false,"button_functionality":true},{"_uid":"563520f6-c780-4c32-b087-9e8166b620de","title":"OUR PEOPLE MAKE ALL THE DIFFERENCE.","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"From our trustees, to the staff to our facilitators who swing open the doors every single Monday night to give guys a safe place to talk. To the army of volunteers who help raise awareness, backing and supporting us, commenting and liking our content. Our people are all so special and without them, we are nothing.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"simple-centered-branded","button_text":"","button_target":{"id":"","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":""},"background_color":"bg-black","black_background":true},{"_uid":"bba0cf2e-a202-4005-875d-feb9cbd9e276","label":"ANDYSMANCLUB","title":"OUR TRUSTEES","component":"team","grab_trustees":true,"background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"473337aa-ef8d-4170-a2d1-c9dcf92bf95b","label":"ANDYSMANCLUB","title":"OUR TEAM","component":"team","grab_trustees":false,"background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"8b7d809c-53f5-4aee-acfd-4e23a3a86de6","image":{"id":4634383,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/1000x750/8600fe2981/facilitator-image.jpg","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"label":"ANDYSMANCLUB","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"OUR FACILITATORS. ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"OUR HEROES.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Our facilitators are heroes in our eyes. We would love to be able to individually write about them all, due to having over 500 heroes, that would be very difficult. ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"What makes our facilitators heroes? It’s got to be the single fact the each and every one of them know how tough it is take that step through the door. Taking the step through the door for them allowed them to improve their own situation and get through their storm with the help of the other guys at the group. They decided they then wanted to help other guys through their storms. They selflessly turn up every Monday to open those doors for 7pm.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"simple-center-branded-with-image","button_text":"","button_target":{"id":"","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":""},"background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"b6f43a7a-e49e-42b5-8d8e-5acd1729faab","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"ALL OUR GROUPS MEET EVERY MONDAY AT 7PM ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"(EXCEPT BANK HOLIDAYS).","type":"text"}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We run talking groups for men who have either been through a storm, are currently going through a storm, have a storm brewing in life or just want to meet a good group of people with the aim of improving one another. No referral, no registration and no charge. Even the brew and biscuits are free!","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"simple-centered-branded","button_text":"FIND YOUR NEAREST GROUP","button_target":{"id":"","url":"find-your-nearest-group","linktype":"url","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"find-your-nearest-group"},"background_color":"bg-white","black_background":false},{"_uid":"d99369f6-e543-4bb5-ae14-202f3c8b5c24","image":{"id":4707339,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/1600x1440/c2ea324923/invite-us-to-speak-800x720.jpg","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"INVITE US TO SPEAK TO YOUR ORGANISATION. ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"WE WANT TO GET PEOPLE TALKING ABOUT MENTAL HEALTH.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"DROP US AN ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"EMAIL","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"info@andysmanclub.co.uk","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":"email"}},{"type":"bold"},{"type":"italic"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":".","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"offset-image-and-text","background_color":"bg-black"}],"meta":{"_uid":"d7b57ea5-11f6-4300-bc9c-fcc9052f7d5e","title":"Who We Are | Andy's Man Club","plugin":"seo_metatags","og_image":"","og_title":"","description":"We run talking groups for men who have either been through a storm, are currently going through a storm, have a storm brewing in life or just want to meet a good group of people with the aim of improving one another.","twitter_image":"","twitter_title":"","og_description":"","twitter_description":""},"component":"page"}
